mapper.insert: insert into gmair_mqtt_management.mqtt_topic(topic_id, topic_detail, topic_description, block_flag, create_time) values(#{topicId}, #{topicDetail}, #{topicDescription}, #{blockFlag}, #{createAt})
mapper.select: select topic_id, topic_detail, topic_description, block_flag, create_time from gmair_mqtt_management.mqtt_topic topic_detail like CONCAT('%',#{topicDetail},'%') order by create_time desc
